gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 117, Spurs 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Spurs, 117-98 as they extended their franchise-best start at home to 20-0 and moved to 32-9 on the season. The Celtics have won 27 straight games dating back to last season. Jayson Tatum (24 points), Jrue Holiday (22 points, four rebounds, four assists, season-high six 3PT), and Jaylen Brown (21 points, seven rebounds, five assists) led the Celtics as Victor Wembanyama totaled 27 points and five rebounds for the Spurs. San Antonio moves to 7-33 on the year.
